LiveNovel Docs (en)
===================

.. note:: This is a rough/WIP English translation of the LiveMaker 3 LiveNovel help documents.
    It also contains some notes and annotations regarding LiveMaker's binary LSB format and pylivemaker behavior.

    This document should not be treated as a formal reference manual for LiveMaker/LiveNovel.
    When in doubt, refer to the original Japanese help documents.

    :caption: Contents

    livenovel/faq
